channel.title: Nr3 v4 help! please help!
channel.description: Hey, i used to own a nr3 v4 server, but my laptop broke. but i saved the hard drive and i now have the files on my tower, but when i boot the server up. and start the client, it says checking for updates - 0%. and in the client cmd, it says error_game_js5connect. please help!?

item.title: Nr3 v4 help! please help!
item.dc:creator: @noah1gamble noah1gamble
item.description:
@noah1gamble wrote:

I Cant port forward for some reason because whenever i try to go to my router thingy (like my ip in the adress bar) it does not load. it just says cannot display page. help?

Read full topic

item.title: Nr3 v4 help! please help!
item.dc:creator: @Haydnz1234 Haydnz1234
item.description:
@Haydnz1234 wrote:

Make sure in your client>src>loader.java the IP is 127.0.0.1 (that’s how you can get on) and then your IPV4 or no-ip address (if you’ve portforwarded) for your friends to get on. Remember for you to access your server even if it’s portforwarded, you MUST use the IP 127.0.0.1 to access your client!

Read full topic
